DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I , open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , randomize ( study medication assign chance ) , 2-panel , sequential treatment study . In study 24 healthy participant randomly assign equally 2 panel . In Panel 1 participant receive telaprevir Part 1 ( telaprevir 750 mg every 8 hour Day 1 Day 9 follow single 750 mg dose morning Day 10 ) phenytoin/telaprevir Part 2 ( phenytoin 200 mg every 12 hour Day 1 Day 16 follow single 200-mg dose morning Day 17 ; telaprevir 750 mg every 8 hour Day 8 Day 16 follow single 750 mg dose morning Day 17 ) . In Panel 2 participant receive telaprevir ( telaprevir 750 mg every 8 hour Day 1 Day 9 follow single 750 mg dose morning Day 10 ) carbamazepine/ telaprevir ( carbamazepine 200 mg every 12 hour Day 1 Day 16 follow single 200-mg dose morning Day 17 ; telaprevir 750 mg every 8 hour Day 8 Day 16 follow single 200-mg dose morning Day 17 ) .
